original_title: Paul McCartney: Music Box Biographical Collection
overview: This unauthorized documentary uses archival footage from fans and collectors around the world to provide a unique glimpse into the life and career of legendary musician and former Beatle Paul McCartney. The program covers McCartney's early life as a lad in Liverpool, his unprecedented success with the Beatles and his continued popularity during his years with Wings and as a solo artist.
title: Paul McCartney: Music Box Biographical Collection
